function Promise(executor) {
  let state = 'pending';
  let value = null;

  function resolve(result) {
    state = 'fulfilled';
    value = result;
  }

  function reject(error) {
    state = 'rejected';
    value = error;
  }
}
function Promise(executor) {
  let state = 'pending';
  let value = null;

  function resolve(result) {
    state = 'fulfilled';
    value = result;
  }

  function reject(error) {
    state = 'rejected';
    value = error;
  }
}

åˆ°è¿™é‡Œå°±å®ç°äº†Promiseçš„åŸºæœ¬è½®å»“ã€‚å®Œæ•´ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

javascript
function Promise(executor) {
  let state = 'pending';
  let value = null;

  function resolve(result) {
    if (state === 'pending') {
      state = 'fulfilled';
      value = result;
    }
  }

  function reject(error) {
    if (state === 'pending') {
      state = 'rejected';
      value = error;
    }
  }

  this.then = function (onFulfilled, onRejected) {
    if (state === 'fulfilled') {
      onFulfilled(value);
    } else if (state === 'rejected') {
      onRejected(value);
    }
  };

  // æ‰§è¡Œexecutorå‡½æ•°
  executor(resolve, reject);
}
function Promise(executor) {
  let state = 'pending';
  let value = null;

  function resolve(result) {
    if (state === 'pending') {
      state = 'fulfilled';
      value = result;
    }
  }

  function reject(error) {
    if (state === 'pending') {
      state = 'rejected';
      value = error;
    }
  }

  this.then = function (onFulfilled, onRejected) {
    if (state === 'fulfilled') {
      onFulfilled(value);
    } else if (state === 'rejected') {
      onRejected(value);
    }
  };

  // æ‰§è¡Œexecutorå‡½æ•°
  executor(resolve, reject);
}

// ç¤ºä¾‹ç”¨æ³•
const myPromise = new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve('æˆåŠŸçš„ç»“æœ');
    // æˆ–è€…
    // reject('å¤±è´¥çš„åŸå› ');
  }, 1000);
});

myPromise.then(
  result => {
    console.log('æˆåŠŸï¼š', result);
  },
  error => {
    console.error('å¤±è´¥ï¼š', error);
  }
);
// ç¤ºä¾‹ç”¨æ³•

  setTimeout(() => {
    resolve('æˆåŠŸçš„ç»“æœ');
    // æˆ–è€…
    // reject('å¤±è´¥çš„åŸå› ');
  }, 1000);
});

myPromise.then(
  result => {
    console.log('æˆåŠŸï¼š', result);
  },
  error => {
    console.error('å¤±è´¥ï¼š', error);
  }

6.å®ç°allæ–¹æ³• â€‹

javascript
function PromiseAll(promises) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    if (!Array.isArray(promises)) {
      reject(new TypeError('å‚æ•°å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª Promise æ•°ç»„'));
      return;
    }

    const results = new Array(promises.length);
    let completedPromises = 0;

    promises.forEach((promise, index) => {
      promise
        .then((result) => {
          results[index] = result;
          completedPromises++;

          if (completedPromises === promises.length) {
            resolve(results);
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          reject(error);
        });
    });
  });
}

// ç¤ºä¾‹ç”¨æ³•
const promise1 = Promise.resolve(1);
const promise2 = Promise.resolve(2);
const promise3 = Promise.resolve(3);

PromiseAll([promise1, promise2, promise3])
  .then((results) => {
    console.log('å…¨éƒ¨æˆåŠŸï¼š', results); // è¾“å‡º [1, 2, 3]
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error('å‡ºé”™ï¼š', error);
  });
function PromiseAll(promises) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    if (!Array.isArray(promises)) {
      reject(new TypeError('å‚æ•°å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª Promise æ•°ç»„'));
      return;
    }

    const results = new Array(promises.length);
    let completedPromises = 0;

    promises.forEach((promise, index) => {
      promise
        .then((result) => {
          results[index] = result;
          completedPromises++;

          if (completedPromises === promises.length) {
            resolve(results);
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          reject(error);
        });
    });
  });
}

// ç¤ºä¾‹ç”¨æ³•
const promise1 = Promise.resolve(1);
const promise2 = Promise.resolve(2);
const promise3 = Promise.resolve(3);

PromiseAll([promise1, promise2, promise3])
  .then((results) => {
    console.log('å…¨éƒ¨æˆåŠŸï¼š', results); // è¾“å‡º [1, 2, 3]
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error('å‡ºé”™ï¼š', error);
  });
